languages.text: "Ты — не {mf|он|она}, а очередная уловка Неба!" {n}Но голос капитана не в силах заглушить шепот гвардейцев, которые уже пересказывают друг другу вашу {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}историю.{/d}{/n}

"You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты — не {mf|он|она}, а очередная уловка Неба!" {n}Но голос капитана не в силах заглушить шепот гвардейцев, которые уже пересказывают друг другу вашу {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}историю.{/d}{/n}

languages.text: 「お前は奴ではない、空の罠の一つに過ぎない！」{n}しかしキャプテンの声は、すでにあなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}物語{/d}を互いに語り合っているガーズマンたちのささやきをかき消すことはできない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は奴ではない、空の罠の一つに過ぎない！」{n}しかしキャプテンの声は、すでにあなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}物語{/d}を互いに語り合っているガーズマンたちのささやきをかき消すことはできない。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht {mf|er|sie}, nur ein weiterer Trick des Himmels!" {n}Doch die Stimme des Captains kann das Flüstern der Soldaten nicht übertönen, die einander bereits deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Geschichte{/d} erzählen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht {mf|er|sie}, nur ein weiterer Trick des Himmels!" {n}Doch die Stimme des Captains kann das Flüstern der Soldaten nicht übertönen, die einander bereits deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Geschichte{/d} erzählen.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen o değilsin, Gök'ün bir başka aldatmacasından ibaretsin!" {n}Fakat kaptanın sesi, Muhafızların fısıltılarını bastıramıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Hikâyeni{/d} çoktan birbirine anlatmaya başlamış vaziyetteler.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sen o değilsin, Gök'ün bir başka aldatmacasından ibaretsin!" {n}Fakat kaptanın sesi, Muhafızların fısıltılarını bastıramaz. Onlar, çoktan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}hikâyeni{/d} birbirine anlatmaya başlamıştır.{/n}

languages.text: «¡No es {mf|él|ella} de verdad, es solo otro truco del cielo!». {n}La voz del capitán no basta para sofocar los susurros de los guardias, que ya están contándose tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}historia{/d} entre ellos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No es {mf|él|ella} de verdad, es solo otro truco del cielo!». {n}La voz del capitán no basta para sofocar los susurros de los guardias, que ya están contándose tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}historia{/d} entre ellos.{/n}

languages.text: “你根本不是{mf|他|她}，这不过是破碎之空的诡计罢了！”{n}队长的声音已经无法盖过周围士兵的窃窃私语声。所有人都在交头接耳，讲述起了你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}传奇{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你根本不是{mf|他|她}，这不过是破碎之空的诡计罢了！”{n}队长的声音已经无法盖过周围士兵的窃窃私语声。所有人都在交头接耳，讲述起了你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}传奇{/d}。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas {mf|lui|elle}, vous n'êtes qu'une ruse de la Fracture ! »{n}Mais la voix du capitaine ne parvient pas à noyer les chuchotis des gardes qui commencent à se discuter de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}histoire{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are not {mf|him|her}, just another of the Sky's tricks!" {n}But the captain's voice is unable to drown out the whispers of the Guardsmen, who are already recounting your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}story{/d} to each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas {mf|lui|elle}, vous n'êtes qu'une ruse de la Fracture ! »{n}Mais la voix du capitaine ne parvient pas à noyer les chuchotis des gardes qui commencent à se discuter de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}histoire{/d}.{/n}
